name: Strawberry Pie
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: pints fresh strawberries, washed and hulled

instructions: Crush strawberries. In a saucepan, blend together sugar, corn- starch and water. Add crushed berries and lemon juice. Bring to a boil; cook until mixture is clear, about 2 minutes. Then strain juice and stir in butter. Arrange remaining whole berries in baked 9 inch pie shell. Spoon glaze over berries carefully, coating each berry. Cool. Serve with whipped cream.
